description: Love sheet pan dinners? So do we! 5 minute of prep time, 30 minutes in the oven, and done. And the combinations are endless! We see a lot of these in our future... We're starting with a Cauliflower Chickpea Sheet Pan Dinner that packs so much flavor, it will knock your socks off.
name: Cauliflower Chickpea Sheet Pan Dinner
recipeIngredient: 1.5 pounds fresh or frozen cauliflower florets
1 pound baby Bella mushrooms, sliced ( you can also use your favorite kind mushrooms)
1 pint grape tomatoes, sliced in half length wise

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper
Arrange the cauliflower, mushrooms, tomatoes and chickpeas evenly on the baking sheet
Whisk the seasoning mix ingredients in a bowl or glass measuring cup, and pour it over the vegetables and chickpeas. Mix gently to evenly distribute the seasoning
Bake for 30 minutes or until the cauliflower is done. Garnish with chopped cilantro or parsley (optional)
